alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren; Breckinridge; Butler; Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Logan; Ohio; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:29PM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Logan County in south central Kentucky... Simpson County in south central Kentucky... Western Hart County in central Kentucky... Allen County in south central Kentucky... Butler County in south central Kentucky... Grayson County in central Kentucky... Warren County in south central Kentucky... Southwestern Hardin County in central Kentucky... Southern Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Barren County in south central Kentucky... Eastern Ohio County in central Kentucky... Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/. * At 429 PM EDT/329 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Leitchfield to 9 miles northwest of Cross Plains, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Leitchfield around 335 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Barren; Breckinridge; Butler; Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Logan; Ohio; Simpson; Warren
